Tutorial

column1: ChineseSimplified
column2: English

column1: String
column2: String

column1:
……醒来了吗？
太好了，你做了个很长的梦呢。
我还以为永远唤不醒你了。
column2: ......Are you awake? You've had quite a long dream. Thought I'd lost you to perpetual slumber.

column1:
咦，你的表情…你说你不认得我是谁？
伤脑筋，果然产生记忆混乱的副作用…
column2: Er, that expression of yours... don't recognize who I am? Oh my, must be the amnesia as a side effect...

column1:
别急，你之前就预期到会有这个后果，
才会安排我在此地等候你醒来的。
是的，这一切都是你的计划。
column2: Not to worry. This possible outcome was predicted, hence my arranged arrival at this precise moment. Yes, this is all going according to your plan.

column1:
接下来，我会慢慢解释给你听。
首先，你还记得你的名字吗？
column2: Plenty of time to spare on a walkthrough. However I must ask, do you still remember your name?

column1:
{[playerName]}，没错，就是这个名字。
看，你还是记得一些事的。
column2: {[playerName]}, yes. That's your name. See? You're faring better than I expected.

column1:
我是澪，我们是隶属传承一派的谛视者。
传承一派是在暗中守护世界的学术组织，
谛视者的使命就是记录各地重大事件，
观察关键人物的动向，
column2: I am Rei. We are Watchers of the Bequeathers, an academic organization secretly safeguarding the world's knowledge. Our purpose is to document important events as they unfold, done by closely following the journeys of characters that matter.

column1:
以预测这个世界的未来走向，
预防重大灾难的发生。
为了将预测的干扰因子降到最低，
column2: We constantly gather intel to predict the future of this world, in attempt to prevent misfortune from ever occurring. Please keep to your duties as an Observer,

column1:
记录时，请谨守旁观者的身分。
真的需要我们传承一派介入，
修正历史轨迹时，上层会另外下令的。
column2: so we may decrease any risks of interference to a minimum. When the Bequeathers are required to take action, the higher ups will give us orders to rewrite history as we know it.

column1:
你手中的书叫做「万象之书」，
是我们用来记载史料的工具。
column2: That is the Book of Bequeathers in your hand, what we use to record everything that's ever happened.

column1:
你似乎收集了不少地上的「魂能」呢，
我们来试试看「注魂」提升角色的能力吧。
column2: You've collected plenty of Soul Energy hovering upon the ground. Let's try Soul Investment to increase this character's skill power.

column1:
在冒险中取得的「魂能」可以在这里进行「注魂」
，转换为灵魂书签的能量、让角色更加成长。
column2: By clearing various Quests, you collect Soul Energy for Soul Bookmarks. The prized resource is then invested to upgrade Characters.

column1: 怎样，刚才那三个人的互动很有趣吧？
column2: That interaction was interesting to witness, don't you think?

column1: 没想到兽人与人类的相遇，
column2: Never thought such an encounter of beasts and humans,

column1: 会擦出那么有趣的火花呢！
column2: would create such spectacular sparks!

column1: 快把这件事记录到万象之书吧～
column2: Note down this event in the Book of Bequeathers straight away.

column1: 嗯？
column2: Hmm?

column1:
最后出现的那个男人，
给你一种似曾相识的感觉……？
column2: The man who appeared in the last moment... he seems familiar to you?

column1:
既然你这么说，
好像会是个需要特别留意的人物呢。
column2: Since you put it that way, perhaps he is a peculiar one worthy of special attention.

column1:
娜雅的参谋技能可以让你攻击一个目标，
使其在接下来的两回合被攻击的效果上升，
选定好目标后，点击参谋来施展技能。
column2: Naya's Advisor skill targets an enemy, increasing skill power for the next 2 attacks dealt. Once target selected, tap the Advisor to cast skill.

column1:
敌方被成功标记了！
长压住敌人，以确认其身上的状态。
column2:
Enemy has been successfully targeted! 
Press to check enemy status.

column1:
参谋技发动后会进入冷却时间，
在战斗中善用参谋技可让战局产生不同的变化。
column2: Once cast, the Advisor's skill will enter cooldown. If used wisely, this skill could be a total game changer in battle.

column1:
嗯，是的，我们目前不能采取任何行动。
上层会判断应当介入的时机。
column2: Yes, that's right. We cannot take any action yet, the higher ups will determine a right opportunity to intervene.

column1:
【发动二魂】
　按住并滑动两个金色魂芯
column2:
[2-Orb Skill]
 Tap and swipe 2 gold orbs

column1:
【发动四魂】
　按住并滑动四个金色魂芯（须为方形排列）
column2:
[4-Orb Skill]
 Tap and swipe 4 gold orbs (must be as a square)

column1:
【治愈队友】
　庞受伤了！试试安洁莉亚的四魂技能！
　该技能会治愈庞并触发庞的四魂技能！
column2:
[Heal Allies]
 Pang has been seriously injured!
 Let's try Angelia's 4-orb skill!
 It will Heal Pang and trigger his 4-orb skill as well!

column1:
【指定目标】
　点击敌方的后排角色
column2:
[Select Target]
 Tap the back row enemy

column1:
【指定攻击】
　娜雅的技能可以指定目标攻击
　让娜雅击杀后方的魔物！
column2:
[Target Attack]
 Naya's skills can select enemies to Attack
 Let Naya take down the monster in the back!

column1:
【操作教学】
　可以将同色的一个、二个、四个魂芯合并使用
　不同数量的魂芯会触发不同招式，试试看吧！
column2:
[Swipe Orbs]
 You can clear either 1, 2, or 4 orbs at a time
 Each will trigger a different skill. Try it yourself!

column1:
【发动一魂】
　点击金色魂芯，让庞发动攻击技能！
column2:
[Trigger 1-orb]
Tap the gold orb to trigger Pang's attack!

column1:
【预测魂芯】
　使用魂芯后，右侧会补上新的魂芯，
　按住并滑动两个白色魂芯，使用两个魂芯的技能效果更强！
column2:
[Predicting Orbs]
After an orb is used, new orbs will enter. 
Press, hold and drag 2 white orbs. 
The power of 2 is stronger!

column1:
【操作教学】
不同角色的魂芯技能都相当独特，长压魂芯了解角色技能，
善用他们去击败你的对手吧！
column2:
[Swipe Orbs]
Each character has unique skills.
Press and hold the orbs to see the characters' skills. 
Use them wisely to win!

column1:
【预留魂芯】
　上波战斗结束后的操作区，跟现在操作区相同喔！
　每波战斗都可以预留魂芯在操作区给下一波使用。
column2:
[Keeping Orbs]
The orb arrangement will remain the same! 
You can use remaining orbs in the next turn.

column1:
【指定目标】
　点击敌方的后排角色
column2:
[Select Target]
 Tap the back row enemy

column1:
【指定攻击】
　娜雅的技能可以指定目标攻击
　让娜雅击杀后方的魔物！
column2:
[Target Attack]
 Naya's skills can select enemies to Attack
 Let Naya take down the monster in the back!

column1:
【操作教学】
　可以将同色的一个、二个、四个魂芯合并使用
　不同数量的魂芯会触发不同招式，试试看吧！
column2:
[Swipe Orbs]
 You can clear either 1, 2, or 4 orbs at a time
 Each will trigger a different skill. Try it yourself!

column1:
【发动一魂】
　点击金色魂芯，让庞发动攻击技能！
column2:
[Trigger 1-orb]
Tap the gold orb to trigger Pang's attack!

column1:
【发动二魂】
　按住并滑动两个金色魂芯，让庞发动攻击技能！
column2:
[Trigger 2-orb]
Press and slide 2 gold orbs to trigger Pang's attack!

column1:
【操作教学】
　可以将同色的一个、二个、四个魂芯合并使用
　不同数量的魂芯会触发不同招式，试试看吧！
column2:
[Swipe Orbs]
 You can clear either 1, 2, or 4 orbs at a time
 Each will trigger a different skill. Try it yourself!

column1:
【发动四魂】
　按住并滑动四个金色魂芯，使用四个魂芯的技能效果更强！

【换人攻击】
　不同颜色魂芯能使用不同角色技能，善用他们进行攻击吧！
column2:
[Switch the attacker]
Using different orbs will allow characters to use different skills.
 Use their skills wisely to attack the enemy!

column1:
【指定目标】
　点击敌方的后排角色
column2:
[Select Target]
 Tap the back row enemy

column1:
【指定攻击】
　娜雅的技能可以指定目标攻击
　让娜雅击杀后方的魔物！
column2:
[Target Attack]
 Naya's skills can select enemies to Attack
 Let Naya take down the monster in the back!

column1:
【补充魂芯】
　使用魂芯后，右侧会补上新的魂芯。
column2:
[Add new orbs]
After an orb is used, new orbs will enter from the right.

column2: We constantly gather intel to predict the future of this world in an attempt to prevent misfortune from ever occurring. The book in your hand is the Book of Bequeathers. It's an instrument we use to  everything that's ever happened.

column1:
不用担心，这原来就是属于你的书。
我会先帮你复习使用方法，
相信你很快就会找回那种熟悉感的，
那么我们就开始了，
column2: Don't be alarmed, you are the rightful owner of this book. Let's familiarize ourselves with the instructions again, it won't take long for you to get back on track. OK? Then let's begin.

column1:
快看看你手中的万象之书，
显示太阳王国的晴空草原，
有会影响世界未来的事情发生，
去探查一下吧～
column2:
Take a look at the Book of Bequeathers. It shows Paradise Prairie of Kingdom of the Sun; something that alters the world's future will occur here. 
Shall we take a look?

column1:
不用担心，这原来就是属于你的书。
我会先帮你复习使用方法，
相信你很快就会找回那种熟悉感的。
你之所以会记忆混乱，
column2: Don't be alarmed, you are the rightful owner to this book. Let's familiarize ourselves with the instructions again, it won't take long for you to get back on track. Your memories are only temporarily lost,

column1:
是因为你使用了灵魂书签的能力。
你能从流动的魂能中，
撷取特定观察对象的灵魂记忆，
再复制成书签结晶，并在万象之书重现。
column2: all because of those powerful Soul Bookmarks. You had the ability to extract Character memories from flowing Soul Energy, which then became Character Minerals, and eventually reimagined for the Book of Bequeathers.

column1:
善用这能力，就能搜集更加深入的故事。
相信你一定能做出更精准的纪录，
协助上层做出最正确的预测。
在谛视者之中，只有你会这个能力喔。
column2: Soon enough, you will be able to read between the lines with ease. I'm confident that your accurate handiwork will provide the higher ups as worthy assistance in making correct predictions. You were the only one amongst us Watchers to possess such coveted skill.

column1:
咦？不，我也不会。
只是在旁边看过{[playerName]}使用很多
次，所以记得步骤。
我会再帮你全部回想起来的。
column2: Eh? No, I am not blessed with the knowledge of such powers. I was only witness to {[playerName]}, who gave me a chance to observe the procedure. I'll guide you through the entire routine until you've mastered it again.

column1:
……看你的表情，似乎相信我不是坏人，
而且认识你很久了呢。
什么？只是有点相信？
没关系，来日方长。
column2: ......Well, it seems you understand that my intentions are not of ill will. Our paths have crossed long ago, intertwined ever since. What? Still a bit skeptical? We have much chance to get properly reacquainted.

column1:
不是自信，而是我对你有信心。
那么我们就开始了，快看看你手中的万象之书，
column2: I say this not out of self confidence, but of my unfaltering faith in you. It's time to begin. Look at the Book of Bequeathers,

column1:
显示太阳王国的晴空草原，
有会影响世界未来的事情发生，
去探查一下吧～
column2: at Paradise Prairie of Kingdom of the Sun. Something is going to change the future, shall we take a look?

column1:
【移动的方法】
●往右滑动让角色往前行走
●往左滑动则可以往后行走
column2:
[Activate Movement]
●Swipe right to move forward
●Swipe left to move backward

column1:
【行动键 在战斗中的功用】
●点击后可以自动使用魂芯
●快速连点可以「加速」战斗的过程
column2:
[Movement Button In Battle]
 ●Tap to auto battle
 ●Tap repeatedly to speed progress

column1:
你似乎收集了不少地上的「魂能」呢，
你能从流动的魂能中，撷取特定观察对象的灵魂记忆，再复制成书签结晶，并在万象之书上重现。
我们来试试看「注魂」提升角色的能力吧。
column2: It seems you've collected plenty of "Soul Energy" hovering upon the ground. You can extract the soul memory of certain targets from the flowing Soul Energy. You can then reform the memory into Minerals and recreate them in the Book of Bequeathers. Let's try "Invest" to increase this character's ability.

column1: 请长压此按钮
column2: Please press this button

column1:
冒险中取得的「魂能」可以在这里进行「注魂」，
转换为灵魂书签的能量、让角色更加成长。
只要善用这个能力，
就能搜集到更加深入的故事。
column2: The "Soul Energy" collected in various quests can be used for "Invest" here. They can become energy for the Soul Bookmarks which upgrades the character. As long as you utilized this ability, you can collect even more in-depth story.

column1:
但要特别注意：
灵魂书签等级无法超越谛视者自身的等级。
column2: But do pay heed: a Soul Bookmark cannot exceed your own Watcher Level.

column1:
刚刚的战斗似乎也取得了不少的素材，
我来教你如何进行「共鸣」吧。
column2: You've also collected some items from the recent battle. Let's perform Resonance.

column1:
「共鸣」可以加深你对角色灵魂的印象，
当提升到最高阶时，灵魂书签会有很大的变化，
敬请期待～
column2: Resonance will strengthen your impression of a Character's soul. Upon reaching Tier SSR, a Soul Bookmark will go through a drastic transformation. You won't want to miss it!

column1:
怎样，刚才那三个人的互动很有趣吧？
没想到兽人与人类的相遇，
column2:
That interaction was interesting to witness, don't you think?
Never thought such an encounter of beasts and humans,

column1:
会擦出那么有趣的火花呢！
快把这件事记录到万象之书吧～
column2:
would create such spectacular sparks!
Note down this event in the Book of Bequeathers straight away.

column1:
嗯？你说最后出现的那个男人，
给你一种似曾相识的感觉……？
column2: Hmm? The man who appeared in the last moment... he seems familiar to you?

column1:
既然你这么说，
好像会是个需要特别留意的人物呢。
column2: Since you put it that way, perhaps he is a peculiar one worthy of special attention.

column1:
……你还在想着自己记忆混乱的原因吗？
我想是过度使用灵魂书签所导致的吧，
这是你独有的能力，
column2: ... Are you still thinking about the reason behind your amnesia? I believe it's due to the overuse of the Soul Bookmarks. This is an ability unique only to you.

column1:
可以深入了解观察对象的故事，
将预测的干扰因子降到最低，
并记录更多细节供传承派高层分析。
column2: Your ability allows you to understand the stories of your observation objects with the details available. You can reduce the interference factor in your prediction to a minimum and record more information for the higher-ups of the Bequeathers to analyze.

column1:
咦？不，这股能力我不会，
只是在旁边看过你使用很多次，所以记得步骤。
我会再帮你全部回想起来的。
column2: Eh? No, I am not blessed with such an ability. I only witnessed you going through the procedure many times. That's why I remember the steps. I'll guide you through the entire routine until you've mastered it again.

column1: 啊！快看你手中的万象之书，
column2: Ah! Look at the Book of Bequeathers,

column1: 显示图腾塔夫将有大事要发生！
column2: undoubtedly something huge is about to unfold in Totemtaff!

column1: 赶紧记录下来即将发生的事吧！
column2: Let's note down a complete account of this!

column1:
【复活魂芯】
　角色死亡时，所属的魂芯会变成红底的复活魂芯
　使用足够的数量后可以让角色再次起身战斗
column2:
[Resurrection Orbs]
 When a character is fatally wounded,
 its orbs will become Resurrection orbs with a red background
 Once enough Resurrection orbs have been cleared, the character will return to battle

column1:
你拿到刃的「魂能结晶」了呢。
让我教你如何「构筑」，将「魂能结晶」转换为灵魂书签吧。
column2:
You've collected Dagger's Character Mineral. 
Time to craft Character Minerals into a Soul Bookmark.

column1:
刃拥有「破甲」类型的技能，
接下来对上拥有「护盾」的敌人时会很有效。
column2: Dagger has Armor Penetration skills, which will be very effective against enemies with Armor later on in your journey.

column1:
但是刚构筑出来的灵魂书签等级太低了，
让我们先进行一下「注魂」提升角色的能力。
column2: The Level of a newly crafted Soul Bookmark is too low. Give Soul Investment a go to increase your Character's abilities.

column1: 做的很好，接下来是「模拟训练」，你必须熟练先前获得的灵魂书签来通过这些训练，才能继续探索图腾塔夫发生的事件，让我教你如何替换灵魂书签组合吧。
column2: Well done. Next on the list is Combat Simulation. Use your Soul Bookmarks to continue forth and observe more of Totemtaff events. Let me show you how to make different combinations of Soul Bookmarks.

column1:
由于刃是「黑属性」，
所以我们要把同样是黑属性的角色替换下来。
column2: Since Dagger is attributed to Black, we are going to switch out the current character in that position.

column1:
如此一来刃就能上场战斗了，
接下来让我教你如何把娜雅放上「参谋」的位置。
column2:
Dagger is now part of the team. 
We shall assign Naya as our Advisor.

column1:
如此一来编队就完成了，请善用刃与参谋来突破，
接下来的「模拟训练」。
column2: Team assembled! Use Dagger and the Advisor to conquer the following Combat Simulation.

column1:
编在「参谋」的角色可以在战斗中施放参谋技，
请长压以确认参谋技效果。
column2:
The Advisor has access to a special skill in battle. 
Press to learn more about the Advisor skill.

column1:
你搜集到「透晶石」了吗？ 
「透晶石」是相当稀有的物品呢。
column2:
Got enough Crystals yet?
Crystals are a rare commodity in this world.

column1: 让我教你如何替新的灵魂书签赋魂吧。
column2: This is how you use Soul Infusion for a new Soul Bookmark.

column1:
成功了，是安洁莉亚的灵魂书签！
安洁莉亚是太阳王国的公主，
看来会有许多有趣的故事环绕着她展开呢。
column2: Magnificent, it's Angelia's Soul Bookmark! Angelia is Princess to Kingdom of the Sun, certainly there will be no shortage of intriguing incidents surrounding her.

column1:
我能帮{[playerName]}复习的地方，
也差不多到这里了。
希望接着在你记录事件的同时，
column2:
That's all I can do for {[playerName]}.
Besides recording events as a Watcher,

column1:
你也能回想起谛视者身分之外的事。
接下来，请阅读记录发生在世界各地的故事吧。
column2: I hope you will be able to recall the memories that shaped your identity. In the meantime, enjoy reading stories that come from all around the world.

column1:
【查看敌人资讯】
　敌方将在血条旁的倒数结束时行动
　这只魔物似乎带有特殊的效果
　请「长压」此处查看敌人资讯
column2:
[Check Enemy Status]
Enemy will take action when the number 
next to its HP bar reaches 0
This monster seems to have special abilities
Press for status

column1: 糟糕，太阳王国的公主居然被绑架了！
column2: Oh dear, Kingdom of the Sun's Princess has been kidnapped!

column1: 嗯，你说什么……
column2: Um......what did you just say?

column1:
不行，身为旁观者的我们，
绝不能介入事件当中！
真的需要我们传承一派介入，
修正历史轨迹时，上层会另外下令的。
column2: No good, as observers, we must decrease our interference to a minimum! When the Bequeathers are required to take action and alter the flow of history, the higher-ups will give us separate orders.

column1:
而且……
不，我只是在想，
column2:
Not to mention......
No, I was just thinking,

column1:
没想到你会担心公主的安危了呢。
总之，先将这件事纪录下来吧。
column2: didn't expect you to be concerned for the princess' well-being. Anyways, let's keep track of this incident.

column1: 啊，万象之书显示了啼林谷的部分，
column2: Ah, the Book of Bequeathers is indicating Whistlewood Valley,

column1: 似乎有值得注意的事……
column2: what could it possibly be about......

column1: 果然，还是会在意希欧与刃，
column2: Can't help but be concerned about Sione and Dagger.

column1: 他们能不能够找到公主吧？
column2: Can they find the princess in time?

column1: 趁现在还有点时间，我们来看一下，
column2: Bit of time to spare. Just a quick peek,

column1: 这是我们的秘密喔。
column2: it's our little secret.

column1:
太好了，公主最后终于被救出来了！
…你问刃追错地方，最后会跑到哪里去？
column2: What a relief to know the princess was rescued in the end! ...As for Dagger heading in the wrong direction, you wonder where he'll end up?

column1:
万象之书没有显示刃的动向，
我想…应该暂时不用担心吧？
column2: The Book of Bequeathers has nothing to say about his activity. I suppose... there's nothing to worry about for now?

column1:
倒是绑架公主的主谋，
居然还命令绑架犯们不准伤害她，
column2: As for the mastermind behind the princess' kidnapping, he or she made it clear that the kidnappers were not to harm her.

column1:
这个人到底在想些什么呢？
总之公主的事，暂时不会那么快有下文，
column2:
Just what in the world is this person thinking? 
All in all, we won't be learning more about this anytime soon.

column1: 我们先搁着，快来看看啼林谷出了什么事吧？
column2: Let's put that aside, and see what Whistlewood Valley is up to?

column1: (使用指示图)
column2: (Instructive diagram)

column1: 璃能顺利入学真是太好了，
column2: What a joy to hear that Leah passed the Academy's exam!

column1: 该不该称赞是蒂卡的功劳呢？
column2: Or should we praise Tica for providing assistance?

column1: 咦？你说蒂卡根本是负责捣蛋的？
column2: Eh? Is Tica actually a total troublemaker?

column1: 也是〜不过能顺利找到种子，也算她的功劳，
column2: Correct. But she deserves some credit, otherwise the seed was never to be found.

column1: 不愧是夏尔院长教育出来的学生呢。
column2: I knew Headmaster Charle's pupils wouldn't disappoint.

column1: 至于那颗种子，似乎在未来，
column2: That seed however, seems to hold

column1: 会扮演很重要的角色……
column2: extremely important value in the future......

column1: 没错，这一切得要记​​录在万象之书，
column2: That's right. Document into the Book of Bequeathers,

column1: 你混乱的记忆已经渐渐归序了呢。
column2: It seems like your chaotic memory is slowly returning to its original state.

column1: 啊，万象之书又显示新地点了！
column2: Ah~ The Book of Bequeathers is glowing again!

column1: 是贫民窟。
column2: It's the Slums.

column1: 看来有公主那边有新发展了，过去看看吧！
column2: There's been a development with the princess, we must make haste and hurry!

column1:
灵魂书签的能力，{[playerName]}已经
运用得不错了。或许可以再接受更进一
步的练习。
column2: {[playerName]} is now capable of harnessing the power of Soul Bookmarks. Perhaps we can advance a bit further.

column1:
这些「挑战关卡」，能考验你对手上角色的理解度。
只要通过试炼，就证明了你对这些角色有相当程度的了解。
column2: These Venture Quests will test your knowledge of enemies. Use this to your advantage, and prove your abilities by clearing these Quests.

column1:
不用担心，前面我先准备了一些「初级训练」，
能帮助你熟悉角色的特性。
column2: Don't panic, I've prepared some Training Quests to familiarize yourself with different character traits.

column1:
请滑动魂能结晶，
角色的记忆就能注入其中，制造新的灵魂书签
column2: Swipe the Character Minerals; the character memories will create a new Soul Bookmark.

column1: 呼〜没想到会一口气纪录那么多事呢。
column2: Whew~ didn't expect to record so many things in one go.

column1:
如果真相都跟纳杰尔说的一样，
那公主的叔叔西奥多就是幕后黑手了！
column2: If Nigel is telling the truth, the princess's uncle Theodore is the real mastermind behind all this!

column1:
…没错，正像是你说的，人的 善恶很难分辨…
如果是你，你会怎么做呢？
column2:
...Yes, like you just said, it is hard to tell who's evil and who's not...
What would you do if you were in this situation?

column1: …咦？你说万象之书再次显示了晴空草原？
column2: ...Eh? The Book of Bequeathers once again indicates Paradise Prairie?

column1: 原来如此，这代表草原上又有值得纪录的事。
column2: I see, that means the Prairie has more events to be recorded.

column1: 这次会是谁的故事呢……
column2: Whose story will it be this time......

column1: 过去看看吧！
column2: let's go check it out!

column1:
没想到一向讨厌人类的刃，
居然会要到人类村庄拜访？
这个世界，果然没有绝对改不了的事情对吧？
column2:
Dagger, who resents humans, decided to visit a human village? Not what I was expecting. 
Change really is the only constant in the world.

column1:
…你说不觉得刃与罗杰等人的相遇，
是需要纪录的重要事件？
column2: ... You don't think Dagger meeting with Roger and Co. is an important event worth recording?

column1:
历史上所有足以影响世界未来的大事，
都是从一个不起眼的小事件开始。
column2: All history-altering events started out as something insignificant.

column1:
或许将来的某个事件，
就是因为刃结识了罗杰等人，
才因此有了转机呢！
column2: Maybe the future has taken a turn for the better because Dagger became friends with Roger and Co.

column1: 嗯，万象之书又显示了新的章节？
column2: Oh, the Book of Bequeathers indicates a new chapter?

column1:
这地点是……枫湖畔？
这是离太阳王国有段距离，
保留完整自然生态的地区。
column2:
The location is... Maple Lake?
It is an area quite far away from Kingdom of the Sun, and has a well-preserved natural habitat.

column1: 那里会有什么值得纪录的事呢？
column2: What noteworthy events will happen there?

column1: 观察一下吧！
column2: let's observe!

column1:
太好了，庞总算摆脱内心的枷锁。
只要能坦然面对过去，
想必也能面对未来迎面而来的难关。
column2: Pang has finally conquered his inner demons. If he can come to terms with his past, he will be able to face the challenges in his future.

column1: 你问东方联邦在哪？
column2: Where is the East Alliance, you asked?

column1:
那是位于东方远处的异国，
未来或许你也能观察到呢！
但现在先好好记录太阳王国发生的一切吧〜
column2: It is a fogn country in the far east. Maybe you get to observe it someday in the future! But let's stick to Kingdom of the Sun for now~

column1:
……咦？
万象之书为何突然有那么强烈的反应？
column2: ... Huh? Why is the Book of Bequeathers glowing so violently?

column1: 需要纪录的地区是…彭列瓦沙漠！
column2: The indicated area is... Poleva Desert!

column1:
看来公主那边的事件有后续了。
接着发生的事应该很重要，务必仔细记录，
column2:
Looks like a follow up with the Princess.
The ensuing events should be important, note down all the details,

column1: 好，开始了。
column2: ok, here we go.

column1:
糟糕了，没想到幕后黑手真是西奥多，
而且王城还起飞了！
西奥多的阴谋就要得逞了吗……
column2:
Oh no. Theodore really is the mastermind behind all this, and the castle is flying! 
Is Theodore's scheme about to succeed...

column1:
……你说刚刚从沙漠一路顺着纪录到炎日军团，
中间似乎有遗漏的部分吗？
我看看……
column2: ...You said something is missing in the notes between the desert and Sunshine Infantry, right? Let me take a look...

column1:
还好，只是些许遗漏，
刚好能接上万象之书接下来显示的新章节。
column2: Whew, just some small bits, no big deal. This connects perfectly to the new chapter indicated in The Book of Bequeathers.

column1: 新的观察纪录点在亚特拉斯。
column2: The new location is Atlas.

column1:
现在这里发生的任何事，
都有可能改变这块大陆的命运。
column2: Anything that happens here can alter the fate of this continent.

column1: 记着我刚刚说的话，把一切都记录下来吧。
column2: Remember what I just said, and note down everything.

column1: 终于…告一段落了…
column2: Finally... a little break...

column1:
只是没想到，二百年历史的太阳王国，
居然会沦落到分裂的局面……
column2: But, never imagined the 200 year-old Kingdom of the Sun would be completely split...

column1: 嗯？你问故事都结束了吗？
column2: Hmm? Is the story all over?

column1:
才不会呢，只要还有人，
人们又为了自己的欲望、理想、使命……
而选择与自己的命运冲突，
我们所记录的故事，就不会有结束的一天。
column2:
Of course not. As long as there are people and they continue to clash with their own destiny, be it about desires, ideals, missions... 
the stories we record will not come to an end.

column1:
咦，你说你还是想不起来醒来之前的事情吗？
唔，看来副作用比我想像得大……
column2: Eh, you still can't remember anything before you woke up? Hmm, the side effect is much more severe than I imagined...

column1:
……嗯，你说得很好，虽然现在还不是很完整，
但是随着这样记录更多的故事，
你的记忆一定会渐渐恢复原貌的。
column2: ....Good point. Although it is far from complete, your memory will gradually recover as we record more stories.

column1:
什么，你说觉得亚特拉斯似乎还有事情？
但是万象之书没有发出光亮啊？
column2: What, you say there are more things happening in Atlas? But the Book of Bequeathers is not glowing?

column1:
………好吧。
我说过了，
我没有自信，可是我对你有信心。
column2:
... Alright. Like I said, I have no confidence, 
but I am confident in you.

column1:
顺从你的直觉，
最后的最后，我们就稍微看一下吧！
column2:
Follow your instincts, for one last time, 
let's take a look!

column1:
是时候带你认识公会了，
你可以在这里建立公会，或向其他公会送出申请。
column2:
It's time to teach you about Guilds. 
You can create your own Guild here, or send applications to other existing Guilds.

column1:
而在公会中，你可以与其他成员聊天互动，
以及接取公会任务、使用公会参谋、公会市集等。
column2: In Guild, you can interact with other members, get Guild Missions, use Guild Advisors, visit the Guild Market...etc

column1: 现在就加入公会认识其他伙伴吧~
column2: Join a Guild now to make some friends~

column1:
太好了！你成功加入公会了呢！
接下来就让我为你简单的介绍一下公会吧！
column2:
Great! You successfully joined a Guild!
Now let me introduce Guild to you!

column1:
公会是由一群志同道合的伙伴共同经营的组织，而公会的升级与维护也需要所有成员的努力。
公会升级所需资源包含公会库伦、魂晶碎片、以及公会任务完成数。
column2:
A Guild is an organization created by people with similar ideals. The leveling up and maintanence of a Guild requires the effort of every member. 
Leveling up a Guild requires Curren, Crystalline and a certain number of Guild Missions completed.

column1: 公会库伦与魂晶碎片是升级与每日维护不可或缺的重要资源，仰赖公会成员的捐献。
column2:
Curren and Crstallines are important resources for leveling up and maintaining the Guild. 
Donations from Guild members help keep the resources sufficient.

column1: 与伙伴们一起合作经营公会，共同努力让公会逐渐成长茁壮吧！
column2: Run a Guild with your comrades and work hard to make it stronger!

column1: 声望是你在公会中所累积的重要数值，声望等级与公会等级共同影响着可接取的公会任务等级，越高等级的公会任务，可以获得的公会奖章越多。
column2:
Guild Reputation is an important stat to you.
The higher level your Reputation is, the higher level of Guild Missions you can get.
Higher level Guild Missions give you more Guild Medals.

column1:
你可以经由贡献库伦与魂晶碎片，提升声望值。
除了捐献之外，你在这里所设定的参谋也会增加你的声望，
column2:
You can gain Reputation by donating Curren and Crystalline. 
Besides donations, setting up an Advisor will also increase your Reputation.

column1: 每次公会成员使用你派出的公会参谋时，你可获得2点声望值，每天最多可获得50点声望。
column2:
Every time a Guild member uses your Advisor, you gain 2 Reputation. 
You can gain up to 50 Reputation per day.

column1: 现在就开始设定你要派出的公会参谋吧！
column2: Set up your Guild Advisor now!

column1: 公会任务所取得的奖章可以在公会设施中的奖章兑换所换取各种物品，随着公会等级越高，可以运作的公会设施也会越多。
column2:
The Medals obtained through Guild Missions can be used to purchase all sort of items at the Medal Exchange.
As the Guild levels up, more facilities will be available.

column1: 每项公会设施可以产出的奖励与所需维护费用各不相同，别忘了到奖励箱领取完成产出的奖励唷。
column2: Each Guild facilities has its own costs and produces different rewards. Don't forget to collect the rewards from Storage when the production process is complete.

column1: 休息了一阵子，你的头痛有好些了吗？
column2: Been resting for a while. Are you feeling better from the headache?

column1: 你说你想要继续记录？不会太勉强吧？
column2: You want to continue to record? You're not forcing yourself, are you?

column1:
………
好的，我相信你。
column2:
......
Alright, I believe in you.

column1:
在你休息期间，
太阳王国的内战已经迫在眉梢。
虽然他们都有充分的理由发起战争。
column2: During your time off, the Kingdom of the Sun civil war is on the verge of breaking out. Even though both sides have sufficient reasons to start the war,

column1:
但内战每持续一天，
太阳王国的人民就会被卷入其中，
不论是贵族或平民，没有人能够逃离的……
column2: but for every single day the war rages on, the people of Kingdom of the Sun will suffer. Be it noble or peasant, no one will be spared...

column1:
啊，你说我支持哪一边吗？
这还真难决定呢……
column2:
Huh, which side am I supporting?
That's a pretty difficult decision...

column1: 也许看到最后会有答案吧？
column2: Maybe when we reach the end, I'll have an answer?

column1:
啊，看来安洁莉亚已经有所行动了！
那么，让我们继续记录接下来的发展吧……
column2:
Ah. looks like Angelia is making her next move!
Then, let us continue to record what's coming next...

column1:
呼～也算是松了一口气呢！
虽然找不到尼古拉大臣，
column2:
Whew~ finally, we can breathe a sigh of relief!
Although they didn't manage to find Minister Nikola,

column1:
但是海德身为他的关门弟子，
看起来也不容小觑呢！
column2: Hyde, his last disciple, seems like a force to be reckoned with as well!

column1:
你说海德最后问安洁莉亚的问题太可怕了？
也是呢，虽然战争本来就有残酷的一面，
column2: Is Hyde's final question for Angelia too cruel? Yes, I agree. War itself always has a brutal side to it,

column1:
但不论牺牲的人数多寡，
终究还是不想看到有人因战争而死亡。
column2: but regardless of the casualty numbers, it's still natural that we don't want to see people perish because of war.

column1:
希望安洁莉亚能做出正确的决定。
若是你，你会牺牲无辜的生命换取胜利吗？
column2:
Hope that Angelia can make the correct decision.
If it was you, will you sacrifice innocent lives in exchange for victory?

column1: 这并不是考题，你不必急着回答，
column2: This is not a quiz. You don't have to rush to answer.

column1:
相信安洁莉亚也会谨慎思考，
不会鲁莽做出抉择。
column2: Expect Angelia to think about it thoroughly as well. A hasty judgment is out of the question.

column1:
嗯？万象之书显示图腾塔夫有事必须记录，
看来安洁莉亚带着海德回炎日军团了。
column2:
Hmm? The Book of Bequeathers indicates Totemtaff to be the next destination. 
Looks like Angelia brought Hyde back to Sunshine Infantry.

column1:
那么接下来又将发生什么事？
我们继续记录吧。
column2:
What is going to happen next? 
Let's keep recording.

column1:
糟糕了，没想到即使是在海德的辅佐下，
居然也敌不过西奥多的攻势，
column2:
Oh no, even with the assistance of Hyde, 
Angelia and Co. are still unable to withstand Theodore's raging assault.

column1:
刃与迪兰受重伤，希欧和碎牙也被抓住，
光靠剩下的人，真的能扳回颓势吗？
column2: Dagger and Dylan are badly injured; Sione and Crushfang are captured as well. Is it even possible to mount a comeback with the remaining forces?

column1:
你说海德的表现未免太过无情？
我也有同感，但站在那个位置上，
或许太过感情用事，并非一件好事吧？
column2:
Hyde's behavior is way too coldblooded? 
I also feel the same way, but considering his position, being too emotional may not be the best thing, right?

column1:
没错，就跟我们有能力洞悉一切，
却无法出手干涉一样……
column2: Indeed, just like us. We have the ability to know everything, yet we can do nothing...

column1:
总之王国内战好像不会那么快结束，
海德似乎胸有成竹，看来他还有方法，
column2:
All in all, it appears that the Kingdom civil war is not ending any time soon. 
Hyde seems quite confident though; he might still have something up his sleeve.

column1: 但是……那又会付出什么样的代价呢？
column2: However... what kind of sacrifices will it demand?

column1:
你看，万象之书又有指示了！
看来海德与安洁莉亚继续下一步的行动了，
column2:
Look, the Book of Bequeathers is glowing again!
It's indicating the next step for Hyde and Angelia.

column1:
他们的下一步是……
啼林谷！ ？
column2:
Their next destination is...
Whistlewood Valley!?

column1:
究竟会发生什么事呢？
没错，详细记录即将发生的故事吧。
column2:
Just what is going to happen?
Indeed. We need to record all the details on what's about to unfold.

column1:
安洁莉亚似乎慢慢转变了，
虽然开始有像一国之君的感觉，
但也渐渐不再像以前一样平易近人……
column2:
It seems like Angelia is slowly changing.
Even though she is starting to feel like a king, she is gradually losing her previously amiable self as well...

column1:
而且连符文学院也卷入了这场战争中，
学术研究者应该要将学问用来造福世界，
column2:
Rune Academy is also being involved in this war. 
Scholars and researchers should use their knowledge to benefit this world.

column1:
像他们这样放弃所学，参与战争，
真的是一件好事吗？
column2: Is it really the correct decision for them to abandon their studies and participate in this war?

column1:
你说我的想法，就跟传承一派吩咐谛视者，
千万不能干涉纪录的对象与事件一样？
column2: You mean it's just like how the Bequeathers ordered the Watchers not to interfere with the people and events we record no matter what?

column1:
我知道你在想什么，但规定就是如此，
我们不能轻易打破规矩……
column2: I know what you are thinking, but rules are rules. We can't just violate them so casually...

column1: 你问其他的谛视者是否也是一样的想法！ ？
column2: Are you asking whether or not the other Watchers have the same idea!?

column1:
这、这当然了……
其他在世界各地进行记录的谛视者，
column2:
O, of course...
Other Watchers, who are stationed all across the world,

column1:
当然也是严格遵守传承派的规定，
你也没看过其他谛视者插手的案例，对吧？
column2:
follow the Bequeathers' rules very strictly as well.
You've never seen a case where another Watcher interfered, right?

column1:
啊，万象之书又发光了，
这次的地点是…沙漠市集？
column2:
Oh, the Book of Bequeathers is glowing again. 
This time, the location is... the Desert Bazaar?

column1:
哈哈，想不到市侩精明的夏洛克，
居然被安洁莉亚整得成那样，
column2: Haha, the sleazy and shrewd Sherlock was played like a fiddle by Angelia. I was not anticipating that.

column1:
真是太有趣了，若是以前的安洁莉亚，
一定没办法像现在这样呢！
column2: This is quite interesting. If it was Angelia from a while back, she definitely wouldn't be able to perform like she is now!

column1:
不过那位商会的会长卡莲，
看起来又比夏洛克精明很多呢，
column2: However, president of the Chamber of Commerce Karen... She seems a lot sharper than even the crafty Sherlock.

column1:
不知道沙漠商会在战争中会做些什么？
应该……不会介入吧？
column2: You don't know what the Chamber of Commerce will do in the war? They won't interfere... I suppose?

column1:
更令人在意的是，安洁莉亚下一个要去的，
居然是亚特拉斯……
column2: Even more intriguing is Angelia's next destination. Who would've thought that it's Atlas of all places...

column1:
自从太阳王城坠落在那之后，
就不知道那边现在的消息如何了……
column2: Ever since the Sun Capitol had its crash landing there, we've received little to no news about what's going on there...

column1:
万象之书又有地点在发光了！ ？
一定是亚特拉……
column2: Yet another glowing location hint from the Book of Bequeathers!? It must be Atla...

column1: ……你说是枫湖畔！ ？
column2: ... You mean Maple Lake !?

column1:
说到枫湖畔，庞与普吉现在应该还在那吧？
那边会有什么大事要发生呢？
总之先来看看吧！
column2: Speaking of Maple Lake, Pang and Puggi should still be there, right? What is going to happen there? Anyway, let's check it out first!

column1: 呵呵，看来记录了一段有趣的小故事。
column2: *Chuckles* That's a fun little story we just recorded back there.

column1:
雪尔森与枫湖畔的大家很合呢〜
希望未来能看到她再回到这里，
与大家好好相处呢。
column2:
Sharice fits in so well with the folks at Maple Lake~
Hope she can return here someday in the future to hang out with everyone again.

column1: 你说不认为这段故事有被记录的必要？
column2: You don't consider this story to be one that requires recording?

column1:
除了了解雪尔森这个人，
根本没有任何觉得足以影响世界的动向？
column2:
Besides understanding Sharice as a person, 
it doesn't offer anything that is significant enough to affect the flow of the world at all?

column1:
但就如之前所说，任何一件不起眼的小事，
都可能成为足以改变世界的关键，
column2: But just as I stated before, all history-altering events started out as something insignificant.

column1: 我们不该质疑万象之书的显示……
column2: We shouldn't question the Book of Bequeathers's directions...

column1:
看来你有些困惑，但这是你自己的思考选择，
我无法干预你。
column2: You seem a bit troubled; however, this is the choice you made after giving it thought. I can't intervene.

column1:
啊！万象之书显示亚特拉斯有事将要发生，
看来安洁莉亚已经抵达那边了。
column2: Ah! The Book of Bequeathers indicates that something is about to go down in Atlas. Looks like Angelia has arrived there.

column1:
在你找到属于自己的答案前，
我们继续记录与观察的工作，好吗？
column2: Before you figure out your own answers, we will continue to observe and record. Do you agree?

column1:
想不到纳杰尔居然愿意跟安洁莉亚合作……
而且公主居然要启动烈日炮……
column2:
Nigel willing to work with Angelia, now that's a surprise... 
However, perhaps not as surprising as the princess's decision to activate Rayzor...

column1:
这与她之前的天真单纯的想法完全不同，
不过才短短几个月，
column2:
It's a complete 180 from her previously naive and simplistic ideas. 
In the short span of a few months,

column1: 安洁莉亚就变得像是另外一个人，
column2: Angelia has changed so much that she feels like another person.

column1: 你不觉得这样很讽刺吗？
column2: Don't you find this incredibly ironic?

column1: 你说你开始能了解人为何会改变最初的想法？
column2: You mean you're starting to understand why people change their original beliefs?

column1: 是吗……
column2: Is that so...

column1:
啊！万象之书传来剧烈的反应，
看来太阳王国的内战，已经进入最后尾声了。
最后的结局会怎么样呢……
column2:
Ah! A violent reaction from the Book of Bequeathers! 
It appears that the Kingdom of the Sun Civil War has entered its final stages. How will the ending play out...

column1:
这会是影响未来世界动向的重大关键，
所有细节都必须仔细记录下来，
column2: This will play a major role in deciding how the world will progress in the future. Every single detail must be recorded with the utmost attention.

column1:
准备好了吗？
那么…开始吧！
column2:
Are you prepared?
Then... let's begin!

column1: 看来，命运最终选择了安洁莉亚那边，
column2: In the end, it seems like Destiny is on Angelia's side.

column1:
而艾利欧救走了西奥多的举动，
不知道会不会影响太阳王国的未来？
而且没想到海德居然与龙神教派勾结……
column2:
As with Elio's decision to rescue Theodore, will this affect Kingdom of the Sun's future, or not?
And I was not expecting Hyde to be an accomplice of the Dracontines...

column1:
是的，那一群紫衣服饰的蒙面人，
他们自称龙神教派，是为了复活斯多利卡，
而一直在暗处活跃的组织。
column2: Yes, those masked people in purple clothing. They refer to themselves as the Dracontines, an organization that has thrived in the dark for a long time, all for the purpose of reviving Sdorica.

column1: 你说和我们传承派一样！ ？
column2: They're the same as us Bequeathers!?

column1: 虽然形式相同，但是我们的目的却是……
column2: Though the same in form, our objective is...

column1:
咦，等等，你脸色怎么突然变差了？
是因为太专注记录所有细节，
所以耗尽精神力了吗？
column2:
Huh, wait, why do you suddenly look so pale?
Is it because that you were too focused on recording all the details that you've expended all your energy?

column1:
虽然还有一些小事情的纪录需要收尾，
不过你先休息一下吧……
column2: Still some minute records that need conclusions, but you should take a rest first...

column1:
你想把所有事情都记录完！ ？
这……好吧，但请不要太勉强。
column2:
You want to finish recording everything first!? 
Wha... alright, but please don't force yourself.

column1:
我会在旁边看着你的，
那么，请完成最后的事件纪录吧。
column2:
I will watch you by your side. 
Then, please finish the recording of the last event.

column1: metagame/story_dialog_coroutine_crash
column2: metagame/story_dialog_coroutine_crash

column1:
$₫¤₪€a_Sㅂ₦₤t
Error/h042:V₤nDÄc₮Îs’_DIALOG_NOT_TRUE
column2:
$₫¤₪€a_Sㅂ₦₤t
Error/h042:V₤nDÄc₮Îs’_DIALOG_NOT_TRUE

column1: 选择你想探查的方向
column2: Select the direction you want to explore

column1: 故事
column2: Story

column1: 挑战
column2: Venture

column1: 主线故事
column2: Main Storyline

column1: 挑战关卡
column2: Venture Quests

column1: 希望能先身历其境体验游戏、理解世界的背景与人之间的关系。
column2: Experience the game first to understand the world and the relationships between characters.

column1: 希望能先理解战斗的基础，运用谋略而达到克敌制胜，进而挑战自我。
column2: Understand the basics of the combat first to use strategies to win battles and challenge myself.

column1:
时候差不多了，
该开始正式记录各地重大事件与人物的动态了呢。
column2: The time has arrived. We should start officially recording the major events and character activities across the world.

column1:
你看，万象之书有反应了，
看来晴空草原最近不安宁呢。
赶快记录下来吧！
column2: It seems you've collected plenty of "Soul Energy" hovering upon the ground. You can extract the soul memory of certain targets from the flowing Soul Energy. You can then reform the memory into Minerals and recreate them in the Book of Bequeathers. Let's try "Invest" to increase this character's ability.

column1:
当敌方有护盾时，基本攻击会扣除护盾值，
直到护盾值归零才会开始扣血量。
column2:
When enemies have Armor, Attacks will reduce Armor.
Only until the Armor value reaches 0 can you start damaging their HP.

column1:
【破甲攻击】
对付有护盾的敌方时，
使用破甲攻击可以对护盾值造成两倍伤害。
column2:
[Armor Penetration]
When facing enemies with Armor,
use Armor Penetration to deal double the damage to Armor.

column1:
【穿透攻击】
使用穿透攻击可以无视护盾，
直接对敌方的血量造成伤害。
column2:
[True Damage]
True Damage ignores Armor 
and directly damages the enemies' HP.

column1:
【冷却】
敌方将在血条旁的倒数结束时行动。
column2:
[CD]
When the number next to the enemy's HP bar reaches 0, 
it will cast a skill.

column1:
【嘲讽】
当敌方攻击前使用嘲讽，
可以避免自己重要角色被打。
column2:
[Taunt]
  Use Taunt before enemy attacks, 
  You can prevent key characters from being damaged.

column1:
【晕眩】
晕眩可以使敌方该回合无法行动，
配合冷却归零的时机使用，可以减少敌方行动的机会。
column2:
[Stun]
   Stun can prevent enemies from casting their skills that turn.
   If paired with the CD:0 timing, you can take away the enemy's skill cast.

column1:
【强化】【易伤】
强化与易伤皆会增加技能效果，两个增益都可以叠3层。
善加运用可以造成大量的伤害。
column2:
[Enhance] [Vulnerability]
  Enhance and Vulnerability both increases skill power. 
  Both buffs can stack up to 3 times. 
  Utilize them to deal tons of damage.

column1:
【查看敌方资讯】
我方施展的减益效果会显示在敌方资讯。
请长压此处查看敌方资讯。
column2:
[Check Enemy Information]
The debuffs cast by player characters will be displayed in the enemy information.
Please press here to check the enemy's information.

column1:
【查看我方资讯】
增减益效果都会显示在资讯中，
有时候敌人甚至会有逆转战况的减益效果。
请长压此处查看我方资讯。
column2:
[Check Ally Information]
   Buffs and debuffs will be displayed in the information. Sometimes,
   the enemies will give debuffs that can change the tide of battle.
   Please press here to check ally's information.

column1:
【被动】
当角色拥有被动时，
长压角色可以观看详细资讯。
column2:
[Passive]
If a character has a Passive Skill, 
press the character to look up the details.

column1:
【强化被动】
发动卡努拉二魂强化自己，
让卡努拉的反击改为全体范围吧！
column2:
[Enhanced Passive]
Cast Karnulla's 2-orb skill to Enhance himself. 
This turns his retaliate target to all enemies!

column1:
【技能搭配】
使用攻击队友的技能，可以额外触发卡努拉反击一次。
在战斗中善用技能搭配的话可让战局产生不同的变化。
column2:
[Skill Combinations]
  Cast a skill that damages allies to trigger Karnulla's retaliate one
  additional time.During combat, utilize different skill combinations 
  to change the flow of the battle.

column1:
{[playerName]}的记忆回复得很顺利呢，
……嗯？好像不太满足的样子，
还想提升灵魂书签的能力吗？
column2: {[playerName]}'s memory seems to recover smoothly...... Hmm? You don't seem very satisfied.Do you still want to power up the Soul Bookmarks?

column1: 「英雄共舞关卡」能加深你对赋魂对象的理解。只要通过特定试炼就能取得「谛视者传承卷轴」。
column2: "Dances With Heroes" quests can improve your understanding of the Infuse characters.Clear specific challenges to receive "Bequeather's Scroll".

column1:
收集传承的卷轴，能取回你失去的记忆
这样一来，也能早日回想起使用书的方法吧？
让我们一起进行试炼吧！
column2: Collect Bequeather's Scroll to help recover your lost memories.This way, you can also remember how to use the Book faster, right?Let us take on the challenges together!

column1:
当招唤援军的号角后，战斗中可以使用援军技，技能发动后会进入冷却时间。
请长压以确认援军技效果。
column2:
During combat, you can use Advisor Skills. After you cast the skill, it will 
enter cooldown.Please press to check the Advisor Skill's effect.

column1:
……醒来了吗？
你做了个很长的梦呢。
column2: ...are you awake? You were dreaming for quite some time.

column1: 咦，你的表情…你说你不认得我是谁？
column2: Eh? Your expression...you don't know who I am?

column1:
别急，这是使用灵魂书签后，
记忆混乱的副作用......
column2: Don't worry. Temporary memory loss is one of the side effects of using a Soul Bookmark.

column1:
我会慢慢解释给你听。
首先，你还记得你的名字吗？
column2: I'll explain everything to you. First, do you remember your name?

column1:
{[playerName]}，
没错，看来你已经渐渐想起来了。
column2: {[playerName]}, that's right. Looks like you're already starting to remember.

column1: 我是澪，我们是隶属传承派的谛视者。
column2: I'm Rei. I am a Watcher who belongs to the group called the Bequeathers.

column1:
你手中的书叫做「万象之书」，
是谛视者用来记载史料的工具。
column2: The book in your hand is called "The Book of Bequeathers". It's a tool that Watchers use to record history.

column1:
传承派的使命是记录各地重大事件，
以预测这个世界的未来走向，
并避开可能的灾难。
column2: The mission of the Watchers is to record major events that happen in the world in order to foresee the future and prevent disasters from occurring.

column1:
我们来试试看吧，
快看看你手中的万象之书～
column2: Let's try it out. Take a look at the Book of Bequeathers in your hand~

column1:
你似乎收集了不少地上的「魂能」呢。
谛视者能够用魂能，在万象之书上重现观察对象的记忆。
我们称为灵魂书签。
来试试看「注魂」，提升书签的能力吧。
column2: Looks like you've collected a lot of Soul Energy. Watchers can use Soul Energy to reinvigorate the memory of characters we observe. We call them Soul Bookmarks. Try to Infuse them with Soul Energy to increase the power of their Soul Bookmark.

column1:
不用紧张，
这原来就是属于你的书。
我想你好像已经知道接下来该翻哪页了〜
column2: Don't be nervous. This is your book, after all. I'll bet you already know which page we'll read next.

column1:
你的表情，看起来又想起了一些记忆吧？
慢慢来，不只是我，万象之书也会引导你的。
你看才刚说完，下一页就已经准备好了。
column2: You look like you've remembered something else. It's okay. Take it easy. The Book of Bequeathers will guide you as well. Once you are finished with one page, the next one will be ready and waiting for you.

column1:
看来你恢复得很快呢，随着你的谛视者等级提升，
可以搜集共鸣素材的区域页签也开放啰！
column2: Looks like you're recovering quite fast. Once your Watcher level begins to increase, materials required for resonance that you can collect in various areas will open up!

column1:
现在让我们翻到下一页，
看看共鸣过后的角色，会有什么活跃表现吧。
column2: First, let's turn to the next page. Look at the characters who have been resonated; don't they have livelier expressions?

column1:
看来你已经逐渐掌握灵魂书签的能力了。
或许我们可以开始更进一步的练习。
column2: Seems like you've grasped the power of the Soul Bookmarks. Perhaps we can advance a bit further.

column1:
我准备了一些「挑战关卡」，能测试你对
书中角色的理解程度。
column2: I've prepared some "Venture Quests" to test your understanding of characters that appear in the book.

column1: 别担心，前面我们会从「初级训练」开始进行。
column2: Don't panic, I've prepared some "Training Quests" to familiarize yourself with different character traits.

column1:
悄悄给你一个小提示，
庞、蒂卡、娜雅这三位重要伙伴共鸣到二阶的素材
也可以经由完成所有「初级训练」搜集到喔！
column2: I'll give you a little tip. The materials required to resonate Pang, Tica, and Naya to Tier SR can all be found by completing all the quests in "Training Quest"!

column1: 不愧是{[playerName]}，初级训练对你来说不成问题。
column2: I'm sure the "Training Quest" won't be an issue for you, {[playerName]}.

column1:
有看到你搜集到的「透晶石」吗？
「透晶石」是相当稀有的物品呢。
column2: I see you've collected a "Character Mineral". A Character Mineral is quite a rare object.

column1:
你问我怎么知道？
嗯......因为我相信所有灵魂书签的出现，都不是巧合。
column2: How do I know? Well, they're important for resonating Soul Bookmarks. I believe that these Soul Bookmarks and Character minerals possess deep meaning.

column1: 接下来我们就随着安洁莉亚，看看她的故事吧！
column2: Next, let's follow Angelia and see how her story unfolds!

column1:
做的很好，接下来你必须熟练先前获得的灵魂书签，
才有办法应对将来的每一场战斗，
让我教你如何替换灵魂书签组合吧。
column2: Great job! Now, you need to familiarize yourself with the Soul Bookmarks you've already collected, that way you'll be ready for the next battle. Let me teach you how to change the team of Soul Bookmarks you are using.

column1: 让我教你如何把娜雅放上「参谋」的位置。
column2: I'll teach you how to put Naya in the "Advisor" position.

column1:
如此一来编队就完成了，请善用刃与参谋来突破
下一场的战斗吧。
column2: You've successfully switched up your team. Now, use Dagger and your advisor to lead the team to victory in this next battle.

column1:
{[playerName]}，记忆恢复还顺利吗？
嗯.....希望能再加快脚步啊，的确有个方法能帮助你。
column2: {[playerName]}, is your memory coming back okay? Um...I hope you'll heal fast. I'm sure there's something we can do to make it better.

column1:
「英雄共舞关卡」能加深你对赋魂对象的理解。
只要通过特定试炼就能取得「谛视者传承卷轴」。
column2: "Dances With Heroes" quests can improve your understanding of Infused characters. If you complete specific training tasks, you can receive a "Bequeather's Scroll".

column1:
收集传承卷轴，能帮助你早日取回失去的记忆，
使用书签时也会更得心应手。
那么，一起试试看试炼吧！
column2: Collect Bequeather's Scrolls to help recover your lost memories. That way, you'll remember how to use the book faster. Let us take on the challenges together!

column1:
【发动一魂】
点击白色魂芯，让芙蕾莉卡发动攻击技能！
column2:
[Cast 1-orb]
Click on the white orb to cast Fredrica's skill!

column1:
【预测魂芯】
使用魂芯后，右侧会补上新的魂芯，
按住并滑动两个金色魂芯，使用两个魂芯的技能效果更强！
column2:
[Orb Prediction]
After using an orb, new orbs will come in from the right. 
Press a gold orb and slide it into another gold orb. 
Using a 2-orb skill is even stronger!

column1:
【发动二魂】
按住并滑动两个黑色魂芯，触发夏尔的范围攻击。
column2:
[Cast 2-orb]
Press a black orb and slide it into another black orb. 
Release to cast Charle's range attack.

column1:
【被动技能】
连续两回合使用夏尔的二魂技能，触发被动技能！
column2:
[Passive Skill]
Use Charle's 2-orb skill 2 turns in a row and it will trigger his passive skill!

column1:
【凑出四魂】
快看，你可以轻松整理出四魂技能。
column2:
[Gather a 4-orb skill]
Look, you can easily pull together a 4-orb skill.

column1:
【治愈队友】
使用芙蕾莉卡的四魂技能为队友补血！
column2:
[Heal Allies]
Use Fredrica's 4-orb skill to heal your allies' HP!

column1:
【队友联动】
迪兰的四魂技能可以同时获得护盾，并且触发夏尔的四魂技能！
column2:
[Teamwork]
Dylan's 4-orb skill gives himself armor and also triggers Charle's 4-orb skill!

column1:
【操作教学】
不同角色的魂芯技能都相当独特，长压了解角色技能，
善用他们去击败你的对手吧！
column2:
[Control Tutorial]
Each character's orb skills are unique. Spend some time with the characters to learn how to defeat your enemies!

column1:
看样子你已经成为一位合格的冒险家，
是时候带你进入冒险营地。
column2: Looks like you're already becoming quite the adventurer. Next, I'll introduce you to the Adventure Encampment.

column1:
这里是专属于你的冒险营地～
你在探索区搜集食物和素材后，可以回到这里进行加工。
column2:
This is your very own Adventure Encampment～
After collecting materials and food from the exploration area you can bring them back here to do work on them.

column1: 想为这里取个名字？当然没问题。
column2: You want to give the camp a name? No problem.

column1: 真是个好听的名字～
column2: What a suitable name~

column1: 你猜得没错，探险所需的料理和装备都是在这边制作。
column2: That's right! How'd you know? All the food and supplies needed for exploration are made here.

column1: 你有看到我身旁的兽廄吗？
column2: Do you see this stable?

column1: 那里是野兽们的家，里面已经有几只可爱的孩子在等你了，我们一起去看看它们吧。
column2: This is where all the monsters live. There are already several babies inside waiting for you. Let's go see how they're doing.

column1: 你可以在篝火旁，与可爱的孩子们一同决定如何建设属于你的冒险营地。
column2: Next to the bonfire you and your monsters can decide how you want to set up your encampment.

column1: 在篝火可以接到各式各样的冒险任务，每个任务需要的技能都有所不同。
column2: Here at the Bonfire, you can choose from a variety of missions. The skill requirements for each mission are different.

column1:
这些孩子们，说想要跟着一起到各种地方协助进行调查呢。
试着一起进行冒险看看吧？
column2: Hehe, looks like these fellas are itching to go on an adventure. Why don't you take them out for some fun?

column1: 在英雄带领下，这些孩子会是最得力的帮手，对于营地附近的调查有很大帮助。
column2: Under the guidance of a hero, these monsters will be the best little helpers you'll need. They'll help you investigate the areas surrounding the camp.

column1: 你要选择哪位英雄呢？
column2: Which hero would you like to choose?

column1: 选择的野兽如果能满足任务需求中相应的技能，成功率就会大大提升，会更容易取得奖励。
column2: By choosing a monster whose skills meet the conditions of the mission, your success rate will increase. Then, it will be easier to get rewards.

column1: 接下来让我们选择一同出任务的伙伴吧。
column2: Next, let's choose a monster to go on a mission with us.

column1: 有红色惊叹号的技能要特别注意，下方有骷颅头没对应到会让成功率会归零；下方有时钟没对应到会让任务时间加长。
column2: If a skill has a red exclamation mark next to it, pay attention. If the skull on the bottom doesn't match up, your success rate will return to zero. If the clock on the bottom doesn't match up, your mission time will increase.

column1: 有红色惊叹号的技能要特别注意，下方有骷颅头没对应到会让成功率会归零。
column2: If a skill has a red exclamation mark next to it, pay attention. If the skull on the bottom doesn't match up, your success rate will return to zero.

column1:
选择好伙伴后，他们就能出发去探险。
接下来只要静候佳音就可以了～
column2: After selecting them, they're able to go out and adventure. Now, let's just make sure it's okay~

column1: 当兽廄空间不足时，可考虑将野兽「野放」，不仅能节省兽廄空间，还能获得「荒野祝福」。
column2: When the space in the stable is insufficient, you can consider releasing monsters. If you choose to do so, you'll not only free up stable space, you'll also receive "Wilderness Blessings"

column1: 「荒野祝福」可以提升特长继承机率，不过别忘了留下足够数量的野兽来解冒险任务~
column2: "Wilderness Blessing" can increase the rate at which your monsters can successfully inherit specialties. However, you'll need some monsters for missions~

column1: 另外可以通过训练来提升野兽阶级，阶级提升后可以解锁新技能和特长。
column2: You can also go through training to increase the level of your monsters. By increasing your monster's level, you can unlock new skills and specialties.

column1: 接下来一起试着提升野兽的训练阶级吧～
column2: Next, let's try to increase the monster's level of training~

column1: 如果有喜欢的特长，可以利用「特长继承」的功能，将辅助野兽的特长转移到喜爱的野兽身上。
column2: If there are any specialties that you like, you can use "Inherit Specialties" to take certain specialties from your Supplementary Monster and transfer them to another monster.

column1: 使用特长继承后，辅助野兽将会离开你的兽廄，别忘了与它们好好告别唷～
column2: After inheriting particular specialties from your Supplementary Monster, it will leave your stable, so don't forget to say good-bye~

column1:
太阳王国内有许多优秀的生命学派符文师，
他们研究出了与野兽交流的方法。
column2: There are exceptional Life Magic Rune sorcerers in the Kingdom of the Sun. They've researched various methods for interacting with the monsters.

column1: 与野兽们交流以后，会发现他们都是些活泼、可爱的孩子，让我来向你介绍一下吧~
column2: After interacting with them, you'll find that they're actually pretty cute. It's quite easy~

column1: 长压技能ICON可开启说明
column2: By pressing and holding on the Skill Icon, it will open up an explanation box.

column1: 野兽们都有天生自带的技能，在解冒险任务时可以给我们带来很大的帮助。
column2: Monsters are born with different innate skills which will help immensely on Adventure Missions.

column1: 体力上限会随训练阶级提升
column2: Strength Points will increase with the monster's Training Level.

column1: 在完成冒险任务后，野兽会消耗一定的体力值，野兽可以进行自我恢复，也可以通过喂养野兽们一些食物快速恢复。
column2: After going on an adventure, don't forget to let them rest. They will naturally regain their Strength Points by resting, or you can speed up the process by feeding them.

column1: 长压特长ICON可开启说明
column2: By pressing and holding on the Specialties Icon, it will open up an explanation box.

column1: 当野兽训练度提高到一定时，会解锁出自身所带的特长。特长可以帮助我们更轻松的完成任务。
column2: After the monsters are trained to a certain level, their potential specialties will become available, helping with missions.

column1: 多多提升训练度，让这些孩子们更加活跃吧~
column2: Don't forget to regularly train these young ones to make them stronger and healthier～

column1: 太好了，看来你已经逐渐熟悉这里了呢。
column2: Wonderful. Looks like you've become familiar with this place.

column1: 如果想更深入了解各区域，可以透过探索。说不定会遇到意想不到的事情～
column2: If you'd like to better understand the area, you can go exploring. Who knows? Perhaps you'll run into something unexpected~

column1: 冒险途中的行为会逐渐消耗饱食度、精神值，当其中任一数值归零时，会被判断为探索失败。
column2: Exploring will gradually use up your Stamina and Vitality. When either one of them hits 0, your exploration will fail.

column1: 这些光点会提示你哪些人物，或物体是可以互动。
column2: These points of light will indicate which people or things you can interact with.

column1: 欢迎回来，看来你从探索中获得了不少素材和物品呢。
column2: Welcome back. Looks like you got quite a few materials and items on your exploration.

column1: 但是背包的容量有限，你可以将旅途中用不到的素材放进仓库里保存。
column2: However, the space in your backpack is limited. You can store the items you won't use on your exploration in the Warehouse.

column1: 这样下次探索时就可以带回更多资源了～
column2: That way, you can bring back even more resources next time you go exploring~

column1: 背包内的物品会显示在下方栏位，你可以长压后拖移一个物品。
column2: The contents of your backpack are displayed in the bottom column. By pressing and holding on items you will be able to move them.

column1: 长压物品1秒后，再拖移到想摆放的位置。
column2: Press and hold for 1 second, then move it to the desired position.

column1: 想要一次将背包的东西全部放进仓库也是可以的。
column2: You can also put all of your backpack items in the Warehouse all at once.

column1: 如果想扩大仓库的空间，只要搜集相应的材料，就可以进行改建。
column2: If you want to make your Warehouse bigger, then collect the requisite materials and you'll be able to upgrade your building.

column1: 库伦可从探索关卡「深入亚特拉斯」中获得。
column2: Curren can be collected in the Exploration Quest "Deep into Atlas"

column1:
偷偷告诉你一个小诀窍，
如果你有一个尚未结算的探索存档。
column2: Let me tell you a little secret. If you have a saved Exploration file that is not yet completed,

column1: 虽然可以从仓库看见背包内的物品，但是无法对背包和内容物进行任何操作。
column2: then you can see what's in your backpack while in the Warehouse. However, you won't be able to do anything with the items in the backpack.

column1: 在旅行时，精神度和饱食度都与生存息息相关。
column2: During your journey, your Stamina and Vitality are intricately connected to survival.

column1: 因此熟练的冒险者，总是会将背包塞满各式料理后才踏上旅程呢。
column2: So, those who are experienced travellers will pack their bags with various foods before setting out.

column1: 哎呀～你也想尝试看看了吗？那么可以到营地内的厨房制作料理。
column2: Ah-ya～ You want to give it a try? Head to the Camp's Kitchen and cook up some delicious food.

column1: 利用搜集到的食材，可以烹煮成多样化的料理，每一种料理都具有不同的效果。
column2: By using materials you've collected, you can cook up various dishes, each of which has different effects.

column1: 你也可以先确认效果，再决定要制作哪一种料理。
column2: You can first check a dishes effects before preparing it.

column1: 另外有部分料理，会因为合成公式尚未解锁，目前还无法制作呢。
column2: Also, you'll be unable to cook some dishes before unlocking their recipes (forge formula).

column1: 你可以在探索中进行多方尝试，如果达成特定条件，在结算该次探索之后，厨房的合成公式就会解锁了～
column2: While exploring, you can test out various things. If you meet certain conditions, when the quest is complete the forge formula will be unlocked~

column1: 越高级的料理，可以获得更好的回复效果。如果想要制作更高级的料理，就要先提升厨房的设备。
column2: The more advanced the dish, the better the effects will be. If you want to make more advanced dishes, you'll need to upgrade your kitchen equipment.

column1: 每种料理所需的厨房等级会显示在左方。
column2: The Kitchen Level required by each of the dishes will be displayed on the left hand side.

column1: 除了进食保持体力以外，也可以考虑携带一些实用的道具，会让旅程变得轻松许多。
column2: Besides taking food to keep your energy up, you can also consider taking along some useful items to make your journey much easier.

column1: 你可以利用搜集到的素材，在合成区制作成各种工具和装备。
column2: You can use the items you collect and forge them into various useful items in the Workshop.

column1: 工作台上已经有许多物品的制作方法，你可以善用「筛选」功能，会更快找到想合成的项目。
column2: On your work station, there's already many ways to make various items. You can use the "Filter" function to find the item you're looking to make.

column1: 藉由切换显示条件，你可以隐藏那些未解锁合成公式、未满足设施等级需求的项目。
column2: Based on what you choose to see, you can hide unlocked forge formulas and upgrade levels for facilites that have not yet been met.

column1: 不是有一句话是这么说的吗？ 「工欲善其事，必先利其器」，如果想制作更厉害的工具，别忘了要先提升合成区的规模～
column2: What do they say?  "A worker is only as good as their tools" If you'd like to make more advanced tools, don't forget to first upgrade your Workshop.

column1: 每当你移动到下一个区域，生存天数就会增加一天。
column2: Each time you move into a new area, the amount of days you've survived will increase by 1.

column1:
每隔一段距离会有一个哨站，可供休息或补给。
有些哨站抵达后会开启捷径，下次只要携带足够资源即可快速抵达。
column2: After a set distance, there will be a rest station where you may rest or collect replenishments. After reaching some rest stations, a shortcut will open up. Next time, you can get there quickly as long as you bring the appropriate supplies.

column1: 敌方的攻击可能伴随着精神值、饱食值的伤害，有时甚至比攻击更为致命。
column2: Some attacks from enemies may cause damage to your Stamina and Vitality. At times, this will be more fatal than standard attacks.
